HeroSection.name: Mostafa Ahmed
HeroSection.quote: Your website... the mark of your creativity on the internet.

AboutSection.heading: About
AboutSection.about: I am a Junior Front-End Developer with over 3 months of experience in freelance work. My journey began with a strong foundation in programming basics, object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms. Specializing in front-end development using Next.js, I am proficient in design systems and optimization techniques. I am actively seeking a front-end developer role to enhance my skills and gain more hands-on experience. My passion for continuous learning and problem-solving drives me to stay updated with the latest industry trends and best practices.
